definitions.title: n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: Persia, persw=n (genit.), Da 11:2 th=| Persi/di (LXX et Q), 2Ch 36:20 Mh/dwn (Opers. Pârsa, Persian, Persia, Spieg:APK 231, NPers. pa0osi ; Ar. fa0rsi;—´[[פ]] 2Ch 36:22 +, [[פָּרָָס]] v:2Ch 36:20 +;—in late lit., 2Ch 36:20, v:2Ch 36:22, 2Ch 36:22, 2Ch 36:23 = Ezr 1:1, Ezr 1:1, Ezr 1:2, Da 10:1 + 11 t. Ezr Dn + (c. [[מָדַי]]) Es 1:3, Es 1:14, Es 1:18, Es 1:19, Es 10:2, Da 8:20; ´[[פ]] Ez Eze 27:10, Eze 38:5 is doubted by Toy (who, Eze 27:10, rds. [[כּוּשׁ]], after Gr), but Krae defends.
